transcript: I don't think that inherited wealth does anyone any good I think it ruins people people get this very powerful tool and they don't have the skill to wield it I think the only way to not have money own you is to know how to generate it and then you can respect it for what it is know what its limitations are and know what you can do it use it for I don't have kids but if I did have kids I still wouldn't give them the money they have to do it on their own otherwise it'll I think it'll ruin them
